publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7908 James Kelly: Congratulations to Flemington Hallside Church, Cambuslang East—That the Parliament congratulates Flemington Hallside Church, Cambuslang East, on its 125th anniversary; understands that the church celebrated this with a special service conducted by the Rev Neil Glover and a lunch that was attended by around 160 members of the church and community; notes that, in addition to affiliated activities, the church provides services to the community such as mothers and toddler groups, sumba dancing and a community café in February; considers that the church is community orientated and growing, and commends its contribution to the wider community.

S3M-7908 James Kelly: Congratulations to Flemington Hallside Church, Cambuslang East—That the Parliament congratulates Flemington Hallside Church, Cambuslang East, on its 125th anniversary; understands that the church celebrated this with a special service conducted by the Rev Neil Glover and a lunch that was attended by around 160 members of the church and community; notes that, in addition to affiliated activities, the church provides services to the community such as mothers and toddler groups, sumba dancing and a community café in February; considers that the church is community orientated and growing, and commends its contribution to the wider community.

S3M-7908 Congratulations to Flemington Hallside Church, Cambuslang East (lodged on 7 February 2011) Jackie Baillie*, Pauline McNeill*, Helen Eadie*, Bill Kidd*, Kenneth Gibson*, Patricia Ferguson*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Bill Aitken*, Bob Doris*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-7908 Congratulations to Flemington Hallside Church, Cambuslang East (lodged on 7 February 2011) Hugh Henry*
